*|Doctor Evidence-Sanofi Post-training email|*
Dear {!Contact.Name},
This is a reminder that you have access to the Doctor Evidence DOC Library and DOC Data packages for Cardiovascular, Diabetes, Immunology, Multiple Sclerosis and Established Medicines (including Consumer Health). A Single-sign on (SSO) system will allow you to use your existing Sanofi credentials to login to the Doctor Evidence Platform by navigating to: https://sanofi.doctorevidence.com/
You also now have access through this same Single-sign on system to DOC Search, Doctor Evidence's advanced search tool. Please take a minute to explore the tool, and watch out for training announcements about DOC Search, beginning December of 2017.
To initiate a project with DRE, please complete this brief form: https://reports.doctorevidence.com/pages/Client/ServiceProject.aspx.
Please also find attached the slides from our Introductory Training and a quickguide for DOC Library. Please don't hesitate to reach out with any training needs. On behalf of the Doctor Evidence Team, we are looking forward to a fruitful collaboration.
Thank You,
Nancy Morgan Director of Learning and Development Doctor Evidence 301 Arizona Ave Suite 301 Santa Monica CA 90401 847-507-1451
